name: brainstorm-ideas-using-ai
description: An AI that helps you brainstorm ideas

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --workspace client" "npm run start --workspace server"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace client" "npm run dev --workspace server"
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run build --workspace client" "npm run build --workspace server"

author: Krishnanshu Rathore
